1: When the Lord restored the captives to Zion,[a] we were like dreamers.
2: Then our mouths were filled with laughter, and our tongues with shouts of joy. Then they said among the nations, “The Lord has done great things for them.”
3: The Lord has done great things for us. We are glad.
4: Restore our fortunes, O Lord, like the dry gulches of the Negev.
5: Those who sow with weeping will reap with joyful shouts.
6: The one who walks along weeping, carrying a bag of seed to sow, will come back again with joyful shouts, carrying his sheaves.
